Hello! We at Skin Disease Detection Application privacy Section. We are fully committed to protecting and safeguarding the personal data you share with us when you use our services. In this Privacy Policy, we explain what kind of data we use, and how we use it.

We might amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. If any Updates we will let you know.

We have designed our services with your privacy in mind. As this is always a two way dynamic process, we would be happy to hear feedbacks from you.

However, if you do not agree with our processing of personal data as described in this Privacy Policy, you cannot continue the use of our Services.
What data do we collect?

This Application requires knowledge of your email, name, Gender, Age, and Address and will also keep the disease detected. However as such, we will also be able to reach out to you or to send you important alerts or reminders.\n\nThe Purpose of collecting this Data is to keep a record of what our application is serving and make changes in that way it will also help us to check the results and accuracy rate which will be helpful as this is a Project. You are hence advised to keep checking on our website, apps or services to be always mindful of any changes to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. You are encouraged to reach out to us for any concerns or questions instead.
Working Criteria:

After initial installation, you will have to fill in your biodata profile, which is stored locally in your device. The data we collect at this point are: - Gender (either male or female) - Your age (discrete number) -Your email -Your username(again, we kept this extremely non specific) At each attempt, you will take a photo of the target skin condition. Please do not take photos which contain sensitive and personal information .This is something which we cannot control. Image processing is then done locally on your device and the result is uploaded to our server for Al analysis, along with a copy of your locally stored biodata
Why we collect your data, and on what grounds:

We use collected data for research - to improve the accuracy, reliability and stability of our Al technology so that one day our capabilities can be used to tackle global medical challenges. By using our services, you explicitly consent to the images being processed for the purposes of the provision of the services and to be used anonymously for the purposes of research, testing of our services and to advance the interests of our Application..Given the experimental and unpredictable nature of this Application, content provided and our policies will change from time to time. We may revise and update this Privacy Policy at any time. \nIf at anytime you have concerns, please stop using our services immediately and contact us.
